sense.name: 电视台, station, television,
sense.examples:
广播电视台。 broadcastiong station.
电视（台）工程 television engineering
电台方位。 bearing of station.
电视采访。 television interview.

sense.name: 电台, 电视， studio, station, television, radio，
sense.commentary: Aequipped place where radio programs or music recordings or television programs are made.
sense.examples:
电台播送室。 a radio studio.
电台呼号 radio station call sign.
电台采访。 radio station interview.
